experience: You and Lisa both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Raoul Encinas, and 76 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Lisa worked at Charles Schwab before you started
Managing IT Director / Sr. Manager, Access Management

• Lead a geographically-dispersed organization with over fifty people responsible for administering access and protecting the data for the firm and Bank• Utilizing ingenuity, automation and repeatable processes, I expanded my team by 200% while the workload grew over 400%• Oversee our enterprise technology access and control program to ensure we have appropriate oversight, audit trails, and governance of privileged access• Specialties: Active Directory Administration; Top Secret Mainframe Security; User provisioning; Audit and Regulatory Exams; Entitlement review and certification; Enterprise directory architecture and design; Role Based Access Control; Privileged access management; Service Management Offerings; Mergers and Acquisitions and divestitures

• Managed 15 person technology team responsible for supporting local executives and West Coast branch and Bank employees located in California, Nevada and Hawaii• Implemented remote access technology on all desktops, eliminating field and desktop visits• Specialties: IT Operations; Desktop, Helpdesk, Mobility and Server Support; Disaster Recovery; Windows 98; Windows 2000 and 2003 Server; Remote Access, IT Operations Management

• Customer Relationship Manager, IT liaison to the business organization responsible for all technical strategy, application design, implementation, project management and technical support. • Client groups: Finance, Treasury, Corporate Attorney’s Office, Fraud, Money Laundering, Internal Audit, Risk and Security departments• Strong Knowledge and Experience with PeopleSoft Financials; Application Development; Offshore Engagements; Customer Relationship Management; Finance Application Support; NT 4.0 workstations, NT 4.0 servers and NetWare 4.1 LAN; Crystal Reports

• Responsible for negotiating $25MM in contracts for hardware and software, saving the company $3MM+ annually• Negotiated and managed $1.2MM stockless office supply account and assisted in the selection and design of over 750 products for two custom catalogs distributed to 3,000+ employees• Negotiated national and local contracts for purchase and delivery of all furnishings for San Francisco headquarters and  branch openings
